ack.title: Acknowledgment
ack.p:
We acknowledge Dr. Jan Fiedler for fruitful discussions and proofreading of this review. This work was supported by the REBIRTH Center for Translational Regenerative Medicine of
10.13039/501100005624 Hannover Medical School
and by the
10.13039/501100001659 Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft
, DFG (KFO311 to TT and TRR267 to CB and TT).
